message:
SYSTEM: GATE(v3-ele_and).pdf: Página 6
CREOLE
• 
GATE integrates 3 types of resources: 
• Language Resources (LRs) or DATA, e.g. corpora, 
gazetteer, ontologies
• Processing Resources (PRs) or ALGORITHMS, 
e.g. lemmatisers, parsers, taggers
• Visual Resources (VRs) or GUI, i.e. visualization 
and editing components
• 
Algorithms + Data + GUI = APPLICATIONS
Introduction to GATE
speaker: SYSTEM
